model module¶

model.model(t, y, mainparaObj, drogueObj, rocketObj)[source]¶

Implementation of the dynamical model of the problem. Simulates the reentry from an altitude of a payload and the opening of a drogue chute and a main parachute.

Parameters:

  • t – Current time.

  • y – Current state vector [z, vz, x, vx].

  • mainparaObj – Object of the class MainPara representing main parachute parameters.

  • drogueObj – Object of the class Drogue representing drogue parachute parameters.

  • rocketObj – Object of the class Rocket representing rocket parameters.

Returns:

The derivative of the state vector [dz/dt, dvz/dt, dx/dt, dvx/dt].

SuperPara
